description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3m51m","text":"Expanding adherend cells to quanteties suitable for cell therapy is a subject of increasing relevance.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhnbl","text":"Variouse cell types either autolog or allogen - could in future be used for medical purposes / in clinical application as a key component in therapy. This protocol discribes how to harvest adherend cells from dextran based Cytodex® 1 beads after expansion. Since other enzymatic schemes like Trypsin-EDTA or TrypLETM have shown low efficiency and yield - here we present an approach that is easy in implementation and delivers cells with high harvesting yield and high viability.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":314,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: ZIM Funding Project - Federal Ministry For Economic Affairs And Climate Action

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"9vv7a","text":"This protocol can surely be further improved but besides that is pretty much strait forward - crutial steps are the centrifugation and supernatent discartion where many cells can be lost if samples are not handled with due care.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6c4of","text":"withdraw homogenized cell solution from culture vessel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7l99f","text":"and transfer to centrifuge tube   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8n2fv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91bka","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10-50","error":false,"guid":"6900489FC72111EDA5DC0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aaip8","text":"transfer samples to a tube rotator and place in an incubator    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cmj4l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10","duration":3600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"89A99040C72211ED8E5141A163A4102A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"37","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7vgtu","text":"add a small volume   of 2x TrypLETM and completely solve the pallet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":33,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5oci6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1-5","error":false,"guid":"1C53CC30C72311ED8E5141A163A4102A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ab6s","text":"add more   of 2x TrypLETM, transfer tubes to a Tube rotator and place in an incubator    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":23,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":87,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"9-45","error":false,"guid":"C701AB6AC72311EDA5DC0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"9-45","centrifuge":"10","duration":600,"error":false,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C701AD00C72311EDA5DC0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"37","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4tn61","text":"discard supernatent and solve pallet in adequat amount of culture medium   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"divvh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1-5","error":false,"guid":"DA8D5940C72411ED8E5141A163A4102A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"923gt","text":"filtrate cell solution through a 40 µm Filter to exclude micro carrier fragments","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhmo4","text":"take a sample from each tube for counting to determine available cell number","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
